verses.text_plain: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 1Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.

verses.text_plain: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.
verses.verse_html: 2For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.

verses.text_plain: Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.
verses.verse_html:
3Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed. ▼
▼ verily: Heb. in truth, or, stableness

footnotes.body_text: ▼ verily: Heb. in truth, or, stableness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ verily: Heb. in truth, or, stableness

verses.text_plain: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.verse_html: 4Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

verses.text_plain: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
verses.verse_html:
5Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass. ▼
▼ Commit…: Heb. Roll thy way upon

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Commit…: Heb. Roll thy way upon
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Commit…: Heb. Roll thy way upon

verses.text_plain: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.
verses.verse_html: 6And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.

verses.text_plain: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
verses.verse_html:
7Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass. ▼
▼ Rest in: Heb. Be silent to

tokens.text: not thyself because of him who prospereth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Rest in: Heb. Be silent to
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Rest in: Heb. Be silent to

verses.text_plain: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.
verses.verse_html: 8Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.

verses.text_plain: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the Lord, they shall inherit the earth.
verses.verse_html: 9For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the Lord, they shall inherit the earth.

verses.text_plain: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.
verses.verse_html: 10For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.

verses.text_plain: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
verses.verse_html: 11But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

verses.text_plain: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
verses.verse_html:
12The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth. ▼
▼ plotteth: or, practiseth

verses.text_plain: The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.
verses.verse_html: 13The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.

verses.text_plain: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.
verses.verse_html:
14The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation. ▼
▼ such…: Heb. the upright of way

footnotes.body_text: ▼ such…: Heb. the upright of way
footnotes.body_html: ▼ such…: Heb. the upright of way

verses.text_plain: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.
verses.verse_html: 15Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.

verses.text_plain: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.
verses.verse_html: 16A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.

verses.text_plain: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the Lord upholdeth the righteous.
verses.verse_html: 17For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the Lord upholdeth the righteous.

verses.text_plain: The Lord knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.
verses.verse_html: 18The Lord knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.

verses.text_plain: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
verses.verse_html: 19They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.

verses.text_plain: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the Lord shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.
verses.verse_html:
20But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the Lord shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away. ▼
▼ the fat: Heb. the preciousness

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the fat: Heb. the preciousness

verses.text_plain: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.
verses.verse_html: 21The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.

verses.text_plain: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.
verses.verse_html: 22For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.

tokens.text: of him shall be cut off

verses.text_plain: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.
verses.verse_html:
23The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. ▼
▼ ordered: or, established

verses.text_plain: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
verses.verse_html: 24Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

tokens.text: he shall not be utterly cast down

verses.text_plain: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
verses.verse_html: 25I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

verses.text_plain: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.
verses.verse_html:
26He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed. ▼
▼ ever: Heb. all the day

footnotes.body_html: ▼ ever: Heb. all the day

verses.text_plain: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.
verses.verse_html: 27Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.

verses.text_plain: For the Lord loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.
verses.verse_html: 28For the Lord loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.text_plain: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.
verses.verse_html: 29The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.

verses.text_plain: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.
verses.verse_html: 30The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.

verses.text_plain: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.
verses.verse_html:
31The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide. ▼
▼ steps: or, goings

verses.text_plain: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.
verses.verse_html: 32The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.

verses.text_plain: The Lord will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.
verses.verse_html: 33The Lord will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.

verses.text_plain: Wait on the Lord, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.
verses.verse_html: 34Wait on the Lord, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.

verses.text_plain: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.
verses.verse_html:
35I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree. ▼
▼ a green…: or, a green tree that groweth in his own soil

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a green…: or, a green tree that groweth in his own soil
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a green…: or, a green tree that groweth in his own soil

verses.text_plain: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.
verses.verse_html: 36Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.

tokens.text: him, but he could not be found

verses.text_plain: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
verses.verse_html: 37Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.

verses.text_plain: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.
verses.verse_html: 38But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.text_plain: But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord: he is their strength in the time of trouble.
verses.verse_html: 39But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord: he is their strength in the time of trouble.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.
verses.verse_html: 40And the Lord shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.
